name: Bobls
description:
I started many, many projects, but finished under a handful. This one is the first to be "finished" in a looong time. Everything was made from scracth and development took 3-4 days.

It is not thoroughly tested, so there might be minor (EVEN MAJOR???!!??) bugs.

Hope you'll enjoy it! :)

Software used:
Engine: GMS:2
Sprites: Pyxel Edit
Music: FL Studio 12 + Retro Boy VST (from SBAudio)
SFX: Bfxr + FL Studio 12
